resources.string:
Hi, my name is Mazi Aleza. 

I love you. 

The kind that is alive and swims around in an aquarium or river, or lake, and definitely the ocean. 

I like eating fish, too. Raw fish. Grilled fish. Smoked fish. Poached fish - not o much. 
And sometimes I even go fishing. 
And even less sometimes, I actually catch something.
